p: In the reports of severe COVID-19 cases, data on cardiac examinations are often missing. However, a report by Inciardi et al., 12 describing the case of an otherwise healthy 53-year-old white woman with cardiac involvement, lists numerous diagnostic anomalies. Remarkably, cardiac pathology developed 1 week after recovering from influenza-like symptoms. Moreover, there are reported cases of sudden cardiac death in non-hospitalized COVID-19-positive individuals with only mild symptoms. 13
